## Source: ossf-package-analysis (494509102be194f3de6962a2ed4e22af22ecab01d9fb1c460b2cf0d93c4e6591)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'invalid-polyfill-boolean' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
